LanguageData.SuperPack_Shielded: \n{1}/{2} {0} are still standing.\nDestroy them to to disable the shield.
LanguageData.SuperPack_UnShielded: All {0} destroyed - the shield is down!
LanguageData.SuperPack_ShieldLetterText: {PAWN_nameDef} is invulnerable! {PAWN_nameDef} is protected by a shield generated by several {1}. Destroy them to disable the shield.
LanguageData.SuperPack_KryptoniteDescProjectiles: They are weak to the following projectiles:\n{0}
LanguageData.SuperPack_KryptoniteDescStuff: They are weak to weapons made from:\n{0}
LanguageData.SuperPack_KryptoniteDescWeapons: They are weak to these weapons:\n{0}
LanguageData.SuperPack_InstantDeath_GizmoDesc: When ON, the first thing that damages this pawn will die. Then it must recharge before it can trigger again.
LanguageData.SuperPack_Gacha_GizmoDesc: Select a spot to spawn a random item there. On cooldown for 3 hours after use.
LanguageData.Superpack_BrainwashPatch_CatatonicMessag: {PAWN_nameDef} has been brainwashed into a catatonic state, and their entire personality has been randomly rerolled.
